newsitem.title: FINLAND: Nokia stock flutters after 96 report.
newsitem.headline: Nokia stock flutters after 96 report.

text.p: Shares in Finnish telecoms group Nokia Oy fluctuated on Thursday after it reported 1996 pre-tax earnings down 21 percent but in line with analysts' forecasts, and sentiment was mixed, brokers said.
At 1340/1140 GMT Nokia traded up 3.00 markka at 326.00, off an early session high of 332.00 hit ahead of the results.
The stock briefly dipped to 320.00, down 3.00 markka, after the news but then recovered in heavy volume.
"This was good," one broker said of the result, but another said the market was not yet sure what to make of the 12-page report.
